name: dfs.mover.moverThreads
description: Configure the balancer's mover thread pool size.

name: fs.s3a.attempts.maximum
description: How many times we should retry commands on transient errors.

name: dfs.datanode.slowpeer.low.threshold.ms
description: Threshold in milliseconds below which a DataNode is definitely not slow.

name: dfs.client.refresh.read-block-locations.ms
description: Refreshing LocatedBlocks period. A value of 0 disables the feature.

name: hadoop.security.groups.cache.warn.after.ms
description:
If looking up a single user to group takes longer than this amount of
    milliseconds, we will log a warning message.

name: hadoop.security.crypto.buffer.size
description: The buffer size used by CryptoInputStream and CryptoOutputStream.

name: mapreduce.reduce.shuffle.parallelcopies
description:
The default number of parallel transfers run by reduce
  during the copy(shuffle) phase.

name: dfs.edit.log.transfer.timeout
description:
Socket timeout for edit log transfer in milliseconds. This timeout
    should be configured such that normal edit log transfer for journal
    node syncing can complete successfully.
